name: Freshdesk Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Freshdesk Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Freshdesk API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Freshdesk API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: ticket | (必填项)
available_options: Contact (值: contact)
Ticket (值: ticket)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create | (必填项)
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new contact
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a contact
Get (值: get) - Get a contact
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many contacts
Update (值: update) - Update a contact

requester.name: requester
requester.natural_language_description: 参数名: Requester Identification | 默认值: requesterId | (必填项)
available_options: Email (值: email) - Email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.
Facebook ID (值: facebookId) - Facebook ID of the requester. If no contact exists with this facebook_id, then a new contact will be created.

Phone (值: phone) - Phone number of the requester. If no contact exists with this phone number in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact. If the phone number is set and the email address is not, then the name attribute is mandatory.
Requester ID (值: requesterId) - User ID of the requester. For existing contacts, the requester_id can be passed instead of the requester's email.
Twitter ID (值: twitterId) - Twitter handle of the requester. If no contact exists with this handle in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.
Unique External ID (值: uniqueExternalId) - External ID of the requester. If no contact exists with this external ID in Freshdesk, they will be added as a new contact.

requesterIdentificationValue.name: requesterIdentificationValue
requesterIdentificationValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Value of the identification selected | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 默认值: pending | (必填项)
available_options: Closed (值: closed)
Open (值: open)
Pending (值: pending)
Resolved (值: resolved)

priority.name: priority
priority.natural_language_description: 参数名: Priority | 默认值: low | (必填项)
available_options: Low (值: low)
Medium (值: medium)
High (值: high)
Urgent (值: urgent)

source.name: source
source.description: The channel through which the ticket was created
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: The channel through which the ticket was created | 默认值: portal | (必填项)
available_options: Chat (值: chat)
Email (值: email)
Feedback Widget (值: feedbackWidget)
Mobihelp (值: mobileHelp)
Outbound Email (值: OutboundEmail)
Phone (值: phone)
Portal (值: portal)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: companyId (值: None)
include (值: None)
order (值: None) - Order sort attribute ascending or descending
orderBy (值: None) - Sort collection by object attribute
requesterEmail (值: None)
requesterId (值: None)
updatedSince (值: None)

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: agent (值: None) - ID of the agent to whom the ticket has been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
ccEmails (值: None) - Separated by a comma (,) email addresses added in the 'cc' field of the incoming ticket email

company (值: None) - Company ID of the requester. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dueBy (值: None) - Timestamp that denotes when the ticket is due to be resolved

emailConfigId (值: None) - ID of email config which is used for this ticket. (i.e., support@yourcompany.com/sales@yourcompany.com) If product_id is given and email_config_id is not given, product's primary email_config_id will be set.
frDueBy (值: None) - Timestamp that denotes when the first response is due

group (值: None) - ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. The default value is the ID of the group that is associated with the given email_config_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
name (值: None) - Name of the requester

product (值: None) - ID of the product to which the ticket is associated. It will be ignored if the email_config_id attribute is set in the request. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority (值: None)
requester (值: None)
requesterIdentificationValue (值: None) - Value of the identification selected
status (值: None)
source (值: None) - The channel through which the ticket was created
tags (值: None) - Separated by a comma (,) tags that have been associated with the ticket
type (值: None) - Helps categorize the ticket according to the different kinds of issues your support team deals with

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the contact | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: Primary email address of the contact. If you want to associate additional email(s) with this contact, use the other_emails attribute.
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Primary email address of the contact. If you want to associate additional email(s) with this contact, use the other_emails attribute.

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: address (值: None) - Address of the contact
company_id (值: None) - ID of the primary company to which this contact belongs
customFields (值: None) - Key value pairs containing the name and value of the custom field. Only dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD are accepted as input for custom date fields.
description (值: None) - A small description of the contact
email (值: None) - Primary email address of the contact. If you want to associate additional email(s) with this contact, use the other_emails attribute.
job_title (值: None) - Job title of the contact
language (值: None) - Language of the contact. Default language is "en". This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Language feature is enabled (Garden plan and above).
mobile (值: None) - Mobile number of the contact
name (值: None) - Name of the contact
other_companies (值: None) - Additional companies associated with the contact. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above).
other_emails (值: None) - Additional emails associated with the contact
phone (值: None) - Telephone number of the contact
tags (值: None) - Tags associated with this contact
time_zone (值: None) - Time zone of the contact. Default value is the time zone of the domain. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Time Zone feature is enabled (Garden plan and above).
twitter_id (值: None) - Twitter handle of the contact
unique_external_id (值: None) - External ID of the contact
view_all_tickets (值: None) - Whether the contact can see all the tickets that are associated with the company to which they belong

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: company_id (值: None)
email (值: None)
mobile (值: None)
phone (值: None)
state (值: None)
updated_since (值: None)
